sentence: What do you call a fish thats on its way to somewhere? salmon en route
explanation: fish of the species Oncorhynchus that is known for swimming upstream to spawn
first_new_sentence: The salmon swam upstream to lay its eggs.
second_new_sentence: The salmon makes a long journey up the river every year.
